description: Looking at how social movements shape the policy making agenda in the US when the issues the social movements are arguing for are in decline in the main policy making agenda.
itunes:subtitle: Looking at how social movements shape the policy making agenda in the US when the issues the social movements are arguing for are in decline in the main policy making agenda.

title: Issue Attention and Demobilization: How Social Movements shape the Policy Agenda when Issues are in Decline
